CollabUserEngagementMetric.name: CollabUserEngagementMetric
CollabUserEngagementMetric.description: Represents the user engagement metrics for a Quip thread in a Quip template or document.

CommentCount.description: The number of comments by the user for the specified MetricDate.

EditCount.description: The number of edits by the user for the specified MetricDate.

MetricDate.description: The date that the metric was gathered in your local time zone.

MetricDateOnly.description: The date that the metric was gathered in UTC. Available in API version 55.0 and later.

Name.description: The unique name of the CollabUserEngagementMetric object.

QuipThreadTitle.description: The title of the Quip document, sheet, slide, and so forth.

QuipThreadType.description: The type of Quip thread. The possible values are: CHAT DOCUMENT SHEET SLIDE TEMPLATE

QuipUser.description: The ID of the Quip user.

SalesforceUserId.description: The ID of the Salesforce user.

Site.description: The ID of the Quip site.

SourceTemplate.description: The ID of the source template.

ViewCount.description: The number of views by the user for the specified MetricDate.
